messages.zh: 我们已经能看到斜向出口了，马上就能撤出切城。
messages.tl: We can already see the oblique exit and we will be able to withdraw from the city.

messages.zh: 短程通讯已恢复！联系上接应小队了，他们在城外汇合点等候——！
messages.tl: Short-range communication has been restored! Contact the squad, they are waiting at the city's foreign exchange point -!

messages.zh: 可整合运动——未必会轻易放我们出城。
messages.tl: Reunion Movement - may not easily let us out of town.
It’s normal for you not to know me.

messages.zh: 我和那个龙女可不怎么合得来，守门不过是例行公事罢了。
messages.tl: I can't get along with the dragon girl. It's just a routine to keep the door.

messages.zh: 为了见你，我在这里可是等了好久呢。
messages.tl: In order to see you, I am here for a long time.

messages.zh: 其实有不少身手很利落的家伙在暗中保护你们......
messages.tl: In fact, there are quite a few guys who are very neat and protect you in secret...
Is the team of Dr. Kal'tsit

messages.zh: 我很想知道，你究竟有什么魔力......
messages.tl: I really want to know, what magic do you have...

messages.zh: 能让他们都心甘情愿，为你毫无价值地送命？
messages.tl: Can they be willing to give you lifeless worthy?

messages.zh: 你真的......配得上别人的牺牲吗？
messages.tl: Are you really... worthy of someone else’s sacrifice?

messages.zh: 是你———你竟然在这里，你竟然......
messages.tl: It's you—you are here, you actually...
- You made a lot of mistakes.
One of the most deadly ones is -

messages.zh: 没有人的生命是无价值的！！
